title: Peru withdraws ambassador from Mexico amid dispute
description: Peruvian President Dina Boluarte has announced the withdrawal of her ambassador to Mexico in response to criticism from Mexican President Andrés Manuel Lopez Obrador, whom she reproached for hurting ties in order to “privilege ideological affinities.”

title: Database of videos exposes the horrors of war in Ukraine
description: The Washington Post has catalogued and verified more than 200 videos from the war in Ukraine into a searchable visual database.

title: Married on the day of the invasion, one soldier marks two anniversaries
description: Ukrainian Sgt. Volodymyr Rusyn spent the day visiting his troops on the front lines — and making sure his wife got the flowers.

title: These two maps show how the war in Ukraine has evolved
description: Data from the Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project organization shows how the battlefield changed over the year.

title: China considers sending Russia artillery shells, U.S. officials say
description: The prospect of China arming Russia has alarmed the Biden administration, which believes Beijing has the ability to transform the war’s trajectory.

title: Moroccan singer convicted of rape in Paris, gets 6-year term
description: A court in Paris has convicted Moroccan singer Saad Lamjarred of rape and assault charges and sentenced him to six years in prison

title: Drone strike in Syria kills 2 al-Qaida-linked operatives
description: Syrian opposition activists say a drone strike believed to have been carried out by the U.S.-led coalition in northwestern Syria has killed two operatives with an al-Qaida-linked group

title: Yemen's southern separatists demand role in Oman peace talks
description: Yemen’s southern separatists are seeking a role in back-channel peace talks between Saudi Arabia, which leads a coalition fighting for Yemen’s internationally recognized government, and the country’s Houthi rebels

title: UN condemns new surge of gang violence in central Haiti
description: The United Nations says a powerful gang has taken over numerous communities in central Haiti in recent weeks and has killed at least 69 people and forced authorities to abandon several police stations

title: Russia, Ukraine face off at UN with rival tributes to dead
description: Russia and Ukraine faced off at the U.N. Security Council on the first anniversary of their war _ with their confrontation even extending to dueling moments of silence for the dead

title: Rebels capture more ground in Congo as fighting intensifies
description: Local residents and aid workers say a rebel group linked with neighboring Rwanda has seized more territory as fighting intensified in conflict-ridden east Congo

title: Ukraine, Western backers pledge resolve on anniversary of Russia’s invasion
description: The somber milestone was marked as Europe's largest land war since World War II rages on, with Russia occupying large swaths of Ukrainian territory and Putin intent on seizing more land.

title: Protests in Russia denounce Ukraine invasion; antiwar rallies held worldwide
description: Russians covertly laid flowers at monuments of famed Ukrainians, as they and others around the world marked the first anniversary of the invasion.

title: Fans praise Lewis Capaldi for continuing song amid Tourette’s symptoms
description: Capaldi revealed he was diagnosed with Tourette's, which is characterized by involuntary twitches, movements and sounds, last year.

title: Russians mark Ukraine war anniversary with flowers, arrests
description: Russians in Moscow and other cities brought flowers to Ukrainian poets and held one-person pickets with antiwar slogans to mark the first anniversary of Moscow’s invasion of Ukraine

title: Experts say bird flu threat small despite Cambodian fatality
description: Health authorities in Cambodia say the father of an 11-year-old girl who died this week after contracting bird flu has tested positive for the virus but has not displayed any major symptoms

title: Cyclone Freddy slams Mozambique with 'dangerous' rainfall
description: A damaging tropical cyclone dumped “dangerous and exceptional rainfall levels” over Mozambique Friday as the long-lasting weather system continued to wreak havoc across southern Africa

title: 10 killed in riots in Indonesia’s restive Papua province
description: Indonesian police say 10 people have been killed and more than 20 others wounded in a riot in Papua province

title: On Ukraine anniversary, EU pledges more support for refugees
description: European Union officials have pledged continued support to millions of Ukrainian refugees, as they marked the anniversary of the Russian invasion

title: 2 Pakistanis reach home after being freed from Guantanamo
description: Officials say two Pakistani brothers who were held by the United States at the Guantanamo Bay military prison for two decades have been freed and returned home

title: Report: Istanbul bomb suspect killed in operation in Syria
description: Turkey’s state-run news agency says Turkish forces have killed the alleged mastermind behind a deadly Istanbul street bombing, in an operation in northern Syria

title: Israeli settlers shoot, wound 2 Palestinians in West Bank
description: Palestinian health officials say Israeli settlers have shot and seriously wounded two Palestinians in the northern occupied West Bank, in what officials describe as the latest incident in a wave of settler violence

title: Jill Biden to Namibian youth: Protect your democracy
description: U.S. first lady Jill Biden has told the young people of Namibia that the democracy their parents and grandparents fought for is now theirs to defend and protect

title: Iran calls 84% uranium enrichment allegation a 'conspiracy'
description: Iranian state television has offered an extended defense against an accusation attributed to international inspectors that it enriched uranium to 84% purity

title: Ukraine: Drone video shows cost of intense fighting in east
description: Although Friday marks the grim first anniversary of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine, fighting between Russian-backed forces and Ukrainian troops has raged in the country’s east since 2014

title: The calculus of war: Tallying Ukraine toll an elusive task
description: Quantifying the toll of Russia’s war in Ukraine remains an elusive goal a year into the conflict

title: Joy amid sorrow: 1st birthdays muted for Ukrainian parents
description: The anniversary of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is particularly poignant for women who gave birth and men who became fathers a year ago, on Feb. 24, 2022, as bombs began to fall

title: What you need to know about Nigeria’s historic presidential election
description: Nigerians head to the polls for a presidential election that sees for the first time a wild-card third party candidate, Peter Obi, and no military front-runners.

title: What is China's peace proposal for Ukraine War?
description: On the first anniversary of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, China offered a 12-point proposal to end the war, which a senior diplomat had teased in Munich earlier this week

title: U.N. resolution to end Ukraine war: How countries voted and who abstained
description: The majority of countries, 141, voted in favor of ending the war and calling for Russia to leave Ukraine. China and India abstained, while Russia voted against.

title: Russia-Ukraine war anniversary: Defiant Ukraine marks year of war as Putin prepares to seize more territory
description: A year of war in Ukraine has upended energy markets, increased global hunger and reinvigorated the NATO military alliance to face the Russian threat.

title: News photographer killed in northern Mexico stabbing attack
description: A news photographer is dead after he was stabbed and beaten in an attack in the northern Mexico border state of Baja California

title: Jimmy Carter’s warning: Without peace, Israel must face ‘apartheid’
description: The 39th president was pilloried for linking conditions in Israel to “apartheid.” But the facts on the ground have begun to change that legacy.
